item.title: Fight pits
item.dc:creator: @IPh34rNo1 IPh34rNo1
item.description:
@IPh34rNo1 wrote:

Hi guys

This is my fight pits code :

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pits")) { if(teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = 2399; teleportToY = 5167; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You teleport to the Fight pits! You dont lose items here!"); } } if ((absX >= 2375 && absX <= 2418 && absY >= 5129 && absY <= 5167 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; teleportToX = 2445; teleportToY = 5177; sendMessage("you have died at the fight pits, log out and in to move."); }

But I still lose items if I die
Please help me I don’t want to lose items when I die

Thank’s
